description: You'll reach your veggie intake with these crunchy, easy-to-eat green-bean fries, served with a bright yoghurt dip.
name: Air-fryer Green-bean Fries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5ml extra virgin olive oil cooking spray
1 lemon, half juiced, half cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat air-fryer to 200Â°C. Place egg and flour in separate shallow bowls. Add breadcrumbs, parmesan and paprika to a third shallow dish. Season with pepper. Mix to combine.

Working in batches, toss beans in flour, then egg, then breadcrumb mixture. Cook in batches, in a single layer in air-fryer basket. Spray with oil. Cook for 7 minutes, then turn beans, spray with oil and bake for a further 5 minutes or until golden and crisp.
Meanwhile, combine yoghurt, garlic and lemon juice in a small bowl. Sprinkle bean fries with chilli flakes and serve with yoghurt dipping sauce and lemon wedges.
